description.value: Shobhad-neh survive in conditions that would grind other species to exhaustion. When you would become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fatigued], attempt a @Check[flat|dc:17]. On a success, you aren't fatigued. If the fatigued condition has an underlying cause that you don't address, such as a lack of rest, you must attempt this check again at an interval determined by the GM until you fail the check or address the underlying cause.
